body_html: Ok, so I can partially train from a deserialized graph if I manually create the missing tf.Variable's and hooking up their internal properties to the tensors and operations from the original graph. So maybe the GraphKeys don't need to be serialized but I would like to make this process easier.
body_text: Ok, so I can partially train from a deserialized graph if I manually create the missing tf.Variable's and hooking up their internal properties to the tensors and operations from the original graph. So maybe the GraphKeys don't need to be serialized but I would like to make this process easier.
body: Ok, so I can partially train from a deserialized graph if I manually create the missing `tf.Variable`'s and hooking up their internal properties to the tensors and operations from the original graph. So maybe the GraphKeys don't need to be serialized but I would like to make this process easier.
